title: My name is Minh, which means brightness and intelligence.
description: maɪ neɪm ɪz mɪn, wɪʧ minz ˈbraɪtnəs ænd ɪnˈtɛləʤəns.

title: My parents chose it because they wished for me to have a bright and prosperous future.
segments: have a bright and prosperous future
highlight: have a bright and prosperous future
description: maɪ ˈpɛrənts ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz ðeɪ wɪʃt fɔr mi tu hæv ə braɪt ænd ˈprɑspərəs ˈfjuʧər.

title: My father chose it because he wished me a life full of joy and good fortune.
segments: a life full of joy and good fortune
highlight: a life full of joy and good fortune
description: maɪ ˈfɑðər ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz hi wɪʃt mi ə laɪf fʊl ʌv ʤɔɪ ænd ɡʊd ˈfɔrʧən.

title: My grandmother chose it because she believed I would grow up graceful and intelligent.
description: maɪ ˈɡrændˌmʌðər ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz ʃi bɪˈlivd aɪ wʊd ɡroʊ ʌp ˈɡreɪsfəl ænd ɪnˈtɛləʤənt.

title: I'm from Vietnam, a country known for its bustling street food scene and breathtaking mountain landscapes.
description: aɪm frʌm viˌɛtˈnɑm, ə ˈkʌntri noʊn fɔr ɪts ˈbʌsəlɪŋ strit fud sin ænd ˈbrɛθˌteɪkɪŋ ˈmaʊntən ˈlændˌskeɪps.

title: I'm from Vung Tau, a city known for its beautiful beaches and delicious seafood.
description: aɪm frʌm Vung Tau, ə ˈsɪti noʊn fɔr ɪts ˈbjutəfəl ˈbiʧəz ænd dɪˈlɪʃəs ˈsiˌfud.

title: The incredible beauty of the national parks is something I really love.
segments: The incredible beauty of the national parks
highlight: The incredible beauty of the national parks
description: ði ɪnˈkrɛdəbəl ˈbjuti ʌv ðə ˈnæʃənəl pɑrks ɪz ˈsʌmθɪŋ aɪ ˈrɪli lʌv.

title: The youthful energy and continuous development are something I really love.
segments: The youthful energy and continuous development
highlight: The youthful energy and continuous development
description: ðə ˈjuθfəl ˈɛnərʤi ænd kənˈtɪnjuəs dɪˈvɛləpmənt ɑr ˈsʌmθɪŋ aɪ ˈrɪli lʌv.

title: I love horses because they are strong yet graceful, and they have a deep connection with humans.
description: aɪ lʌv ˈhɔrsəz bɪˈkɔz ðeɪ ɑr strɔŋ jɛt ˈɡreɪsfəl, ænd ðeɪ hæv ə dip kəˈnɛkʃən wɪð ˈhjumənz.

title: I especially enjoy how free-spirited they are, as it makes spending time with them really inspiring and adventurous.
segments: as it makes spending time with them really
description: aɪ əˈspɛʃli ɛnˈʤɔɪ haʊ fri-ˈspɪrɪtəd ðeɪ ɑr, æz ɪt meɪks ˈspɛndɪŋ taɪm wɪð ðɛm ˈrɪli ɪnˈspaɪrɪŋ ænd ædˈvɛnʧərəs.

title: I prefer a busy cafe because complete silence makes me feel uneasy and distracted by my own thoughts.
segments: complete silence makes me feel uneasy and distracted by my own thoughts
highlight: complete silence makes me feel uneasy and distracted by my own thoughts
description: aɪ prəˈfɜr ə ˈbɪzi kəˈfeɪ bɪˈkɔz kəmˈplit ˈsaɪləns meɪks mi fil əˈnizi ænd dɪˈstræktɪd baɪ maɪ oʊn θɔts.

title: I prefer a silent environment because distractions make it hard for me to stay engaged.
segments: distractions make it hard for me to stay engaged
highlight: distractions make it hard for me to stay engaged
description: aɪ prəˈfɜr ə ˈsaɪlənt ɪnˈvaɪrənmənt bɪˈkɔz dɪˈstrækʃənz meɪk ɪt hɑrd fɔr mi tu steɪ ɛnˈɡeɪʤd.

title: I prefer reading on public transport because it allows me to visualize and understand the material better.
segments: visualize and understand the material better
highlight: visualize and understand the material better
description: aɪ prəˈfɜr ˈridɪŋ ɑn ˈpʌblɪk ˈtrænspɔrt bɪˈkɔz ɪt əˈlaʊz mi tu ˈvɪʒwəˌlaɪz ænd ˌʌndərˈstænd ðə məˈtɪriəl ˈbɛtər.

title: I prefer reading in a peaceful space because it helps me to focus better and fully absorb the content.
segments: focus better and fully absorb the content
highlight: focus better and fully absorb the content
description: aɪ prəˈfɜr ˈridɪŋ ɪn ə ˈpisfəl speɪs bɪˈkɔz ɪt hɛlps mi tu ˈfoʊkəs ˈbɛtər ænd ˈfʊli əbˈzɔrb ðə ˈkɑntɛnt.

title: However, if I have to read in a noisy environment, I can still focus by mentally blocking out the noise.
segments: However, if I have to read in
description: ˌhaʊˈɛvər, ɪf aɪ hæv tu rid ɪn ə ˈnɔɪzi ɪnˈvaɪrənmənt, aɪ kæn stɪl ˈfoʊkəs baɪ ˈmɛntəli ˈblɑkɪŋ aʊt ðə nɔɪz.

title: However, if I have to read in a peaceful surrounding, I can still concentrate by sipping coffee or taking notes as I read.
segments: However, if I have to read in
sipping coffee or taking notes as I read
highlight: sipping coffee or taking notes as I read
description: haʊˈɛvər, ɪf aɪ hæv tu rid ɪn ə ˈpisfəl səˈraʊndɪŋ, aɪ kæn stɪl ˈkɑnsənˌtreɪt baɪ ˈsɪpɪŋ ˈkɑfi ɔr ˈteɪkɪŋ noʊts æz aɪ rid.
